attributes.action: actively encourage the recognition of the Centenary of Scouting during 2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Encourage various departments of the Government to include the positive contribution to this country, and international friendship, when discussing their work.

Encourage members of parliament and civil servants to recognise their past (or current) Scouting roles by wearing a symbol of their membership.

Encourage MP's to seek out and support local activities and events that their Scouting community are arranging during 2007.

government_responses.details:
